page.title: 10QUERNMORE SPORTS 1
page.content: Quernmore Sports are held every year on a field in Quernmore on the third Saturday in May. It is a very popular day for people of all ages, the younger ones are enjoying all the activities and the older ones are watching them and thinking about what they did when they were young. The day starts with sheepdog trials held in a neighbouring field. The first run is about 8 a.m. and the competition goes on all day until it is nearly dark, with people coming from all over the country to take part. The actual sports start in the afternoon with the Fancy Dress Parade. This is always well supported and the judges have a hard job choosing the winners for the six classes. The best overall winner gets the Riley cup.
